actions.description: The alhoon makes two Chilling Grasp or Arcane Bolt attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) cold damage, and the alhoon regains 14 hit points.
actions.name: Chilling Grasp

actions.description: 8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (8d6) force damage.
actions.name: Arcane Bolt

actions.description: The alhoon magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
The alhoon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
At will: dancing lights, detect magic, detect thoughts, disguise self, mage hand, prestidigitation

1/day each: dominate monster, globe of invulnerability, invisibility, modify memory, plane shift (self only), wall of force
actions.name: Spellcasting

specialTraits.description: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns Undead.
specialTraits.name: Turn Resistance
